view

Class GlobalView

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.GlobalView

  • public class GlobalView
extends java.lang.Object
    Class handling the display of every element of the game. Dsiplays monsters, scores, candys and door.

      • createGlobalView

        public void createGlobalView(javafx.stage.Stage stage,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> wallCoordinates)
        Creates every element needed to be displayed. Displays the labyrinth walls, player and the score.
        Parameters:
        stage - the window to display the game in.
        wallCoordinates - ArrayList representig the coordinates of the labyrinth walls.

      • addCandyView

        public void addCandyView(int ident,
                         int x,
                         int y)
        Add a candyView to the hashmap. A hashmap allows us to link the view with the corresponding model.
        Parameters:
        ident - unique identifier of the CandyView
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate

      • addEnemyView

        public void addEnemyView(int x,
                         int y)
        Add an enemy to the hashmap. A hashmap allows us to link the view with the corresponding model.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate

      • addButtonView

        public void addButtonView(int x,
                          int y)
        Add an button to the hashmap. A hashmap allows us to link the view with the corresponding model.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate

      • addDoorView

        public void addDoorView(int x,
                        int y)
        Creates and displays the door.
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate
        y - Y coordinate

      • removeCandyFromView

        public void removeCandyFromView(int ident)
        Remove a candy from display and from HashMap when picked up by the player.
        Parameters:
        ident - identifier of the candy

      • resetView

        public void resetView()
        Empties every hashMap and clear the pane to free memory. Called when the player won or touches a monster.
